column1: '''Feagwaith''' is the hero of the video game trilogy [[Mines of Moria (video game series)
column2: Mines of Moria]]. He leaves his land, [[Gondor]], to search for Mithril in the [[Khazad-d√ªm
column3: Mines of Moria]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/mom.html Mines of Moria] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 17 April 2011)</ref><ref name="El Anillo">[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=GEN&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=9 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 10 (retrieved 17 April 2011)</ref> After finding it, he escapes and returns to his homeland, Gondor, to deliver a medicine.<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/mom3.html Mines of Moria 3] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 21 April 2011)</ref><ref name="El Anillo"/>
